description:
There are many issue with this software like it stops working in between of your work because of which we can't trace our work. And sometimes it also take screenshots from other ID's in our system.
So all this kind of issues need to fix to improve the software.
summary: It's good but not for company level software

description: Worst Software. Works sometimes and sometimes not working. Screenshots are captured and you can see it but the time went in idle state. Stupid!
Once installed then can't be removed.
summary: Once installed then can't be removed
